title: low priority
body:

connected and reconnected 
i don't leave game when we're in battle 
it's network and you 'll know all date from my account when you check it 
help me i can't wait 20min for each game to 5 
i get ban low priority  when my account  reconnected til i connected i got low priority 
it's first time to play this amazing game and i know the rules

replies.body: It really sucks that your network was running into so many troubles staying connected with the game servers, but after noticing a trend of leaves you'll have to play through those matched uninterrupted to get them off your account. I'd really suggest maybe trying an ethernet cable for a stronger, more stable link to the game, but also be sure to check out the steps in this [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.
